org.strongback.components.ui

Interface ContinuousRange

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ContinuousRange
    Defines a range of values between [-1.0, 1.0] inclusive.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ContinuousRange invert()
      Create a new range that inverts the values of this instance.
      default ContinuousRange map(DoubleToDoubleFunction mapFunction)
      Create a new range that maps the values of this instance using the supplied function.
      double read()
      Read the current value.
      default ContinuousRange scale(double scale)
      Create a new range that scales the values of this instance.
      default ContinuousRange scale(DoubleSupplier scale)
      Create a new range that scales the values of this instance.
      default IntSupplier scaleAsInt(double scale)
      Create a new IntSupplier that scales the values of this instance and rounds to an integer.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        double read()
        Read the current value.
        Returns:
        the value in the range [-1.0, 1.0] inclusive.

      • invert

        default ContinuousRange invert()
        Create a new range that inverts the values of this instance.
        Returns:
        the new inverted range; never null

      • scale

        default ContinuousRange scale(double scale)
        Create a new range that scales the values of this instance.
        Parameters:
        scale - the scaling factor
        Returns:
        the new scaled range; never null

      • scale

        default ContinuousRange scale(DoubleSupplier scale)
        Create a new range that scales the values of this instance.
        Parameters:
        scale - the function that determines the scaling factor
        Returns:
        the new scaled range; never null

      • map

        default ContinuousRange map(DoubleToDoubleFunction mapFunction)
        Create a new range that maps the values of this instance using the supplied function.
        Parameters:
        mapFunction - the function that maps the current value to another
        Returns:
        the new mapped range; never null

      • scaleAsInt

        default IntSupplier scaleAsInt(double scale)
        Create a new IntSupplier that scales the values of this instance and rounds to an integer.
        Parameters:
        scale - the scaling factor
        Returns:
        the new scaled IntSupplier; never null
